cmds: (for l in $(seq 1 1000); do echo linea$l; done) > lineas

tests.cmd: psplit -h | head -1
psplit -h | head -3 | tail -1
tests.out: ^.*-l NLINES Número máximo de líneas por fichero.\r\n$

tests.cmd: psplit -h | tail -2
( echo 123456) | psplit -l 1 -b 1
( echo 1; echo 2; echo 3; echo 4; echo 5) | psplit -l 2 ; wc -l stdin0 stdin1 stdin2 ; rm -f stdin0 stdin1 stdin2
( echo -n 12345) | psplit -b 2 ; wc -c stdin0 stdin1 stdin2 ; rm -f stdin0 stdin1 stdin2
( echo 0; echo 1) | tee splitme | psplit -l 1 ; wc -c stdin0 stdin1 ; cat stdin0 ; cat stdin1 ; cat stdin0 stdin1 > splitmecopy ; diff splitme splitmecopy ; rm -f splitme splitmecopy

( echo 0; echo 1) | tee splitme | psplit -b 1 -s 10 ; wc -c stdin0 stdin1 stdin2 stdin3 ; cat stdin0 stdin1 stdin2 stdin3 ; cat stdin0 stdin1 stdin2 stdin3 > splitmecopy ; diff splitme splitmecopy ; rm -f splitme splitmecopy

( echo 0; echo 1) | tee splitme | psplit -b 1 -s  1 ; wc -c stdin0 stdin1 stdin2 stdin3 ; cat stdin0 stdin1 stdin2 stdin3 ; cat stdin0 stdin1 stdin2 stdin3 > splitmecopy ; diff splitme splitmecopy ; rm -f splitme splitmecopy
cat lineas | psplit -l 1001          ; cat stdin0 | tail -1 ; rm -f stdin0
cat lineas | psplit -l 1000          ; cat stdin0 | tail -1 ; rm -f stdin0
cat lineas | psplit -l 1000 -s 1     ; cat stdin0 | tail -1 ; rm -f stdin0
cat lineas | psplit -l 1000 -s 65536 ; cat stdin0 | tail -1 ; rm -f stdin0
cat lineas | psplit -l  999 ; cat stdin1 ; rm -f stdin0 stdin1
cat bytes  | psplit -b 1024          ; wc -c stdin65535 ; rm -f stdin0 stdin1
cat bytes  | psplit -b 1024 -s   128 ; wc -c stdin65535 ; rm -f stdin0 stdin1
cat bytes  | psplit -b 1024 -s 65536 ; wc -c stdin65535 ; rm -f stdin0 stdin1
cat bytes  | psplit -b 1000          ; wc -c stdin67108 ; rm -f stdin0 stdin1
cat bytes  | psplit -b 1000 -s   128 ; wc -c stdin67108 ; rm -f stdin0 stdin1
cat bytes  | psplit -b 1000 -s 65536 ; wc -c stdin67108 ; rm -f stdin0 stdin1
cat bytes  | psplit -b 32000000 ; cat stdin0 stdin1 stdin2 > bytescopy ; diff -s bytes bytescopy
tests.out: ^Los archivos bytes y bytescopy son idénticos\r\n$

tests.cmd: psplit -b 32000000            bytes morebytes ; cat bytes0 morebytes1 bytes2 > bytescopy ; diff -s morebytes bytescopy
tests.out: ^Los archivos morebytes y bytescopy son idénticos\r\n$

tests.cmd: psplit -b 32000000 -s     128 bytes morebytes ; cat bytes0 morebytes1 bytes2 > bytescopy ; diff -s morebytes bytescopy
tests.out: ^Los archivos morebytes y bytescopy son idénticos\r\n$

tests.cmd: psplit -b 32000000 -s 1048576 bytes morebytes ; cat bytes0 morebytes1 bytes2 > bytescopy ; diff -s morebytes bytescopy
tests.out: ^Los archivos morebytes y bytescopy son idénticos\r\n$

tests.cmd: psplit -b 4096 -s 4096 bytes -p 1
psplit -b 4096 -s 4096 bytes -p 2
psplit -b 4096 -s 4096 bytes morebytes -p 1
psplit -b 4096 -s 4096 bytes morebytes -p 2
psplit -b 4096 -s 4096 bytes morebytes evenmorebytes -p 3
